revised_title: Improved Method for Roll-Up Calculations of Vortex Sheets
tldr: The authors present a new method for calculating the roll-up of vortex sheets, which involves a careful discretization process and avoids the need for artificial smoothing techniques. This method is applied to the classical problem of the roll-up of a vortex sheet downstream of an elliptically loaded lifting line, demonstrating its effectiveness and consistency as segmentation is refined.
